notes: A parsed corpus of spoken English. Ca 400,000 words from ICE-GB (early 1990s) and 400,000 words from the London-Lund Corpus (late 1960s-early 1980s). The orthographic transcriptions have been normalised and annotated.
title: Diachronic Corpus of Present-Day Spoken English (DCPSE)
